properties.name: simple-email.encode
properties.description: default encode is base64. if want to set charset, please set spring.mail.default-encoding(if not set, default UTF-8)

properties.name: simple-email.template-root-path
properties.description:
a dir like classpath:xxxx or file:xxxx. template file must has extension of .html or .txt.

default templates is in classpath:/email. if set {@link SimpleEmailProperties#templateRootPath} will give up to use default.

properties.name: simple-email.variables
properties.description: key is  global(shared to all template)  or  template filename without extension(if some name, will be shared, like some filename but file type is different)
